text: Chernóbil, la noche del fin del mundo () is a Spanish documentary. It was produced by Plural Entertainment. It is hosted by Iker Jiménez and his partner and wife, Carmen Porter. The documentary is about the 1986 Chornobyl disaster. It was broadcast for the first time on 11 June 2008 at Yelmo Islazul cinemas in Madrid. == References == Category:2008 movies Category:2000s documentary movies Category:Spanish-language movies Category:Spanish documentary movies Category:Movies about nuclear accidents
title: Chernóbil, la noche del fin del mundo
